title: Help identifying tattoo font??
content:
Can anyone help me figure out what font this tattoo is? Any help would be much appreciated! Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/typophile.com/files/image_51.jpg) | 29.23 KB |
author: Molly2458

comments.content:
Obviously done by hand ;) Just kidding of course (but most probably not so much unfortunately....)  
Don't know this one if it's a font (really doubt actually). Some alternatives: [CK Cursive](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.creatingkeepsakes.com/articles/CK_Cursive), [Plumero Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/plumero-script), [Signerica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/signerica), [Bombshell](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro), [Vermandois](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/vermandois), [Saissant](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/saissant), [Jacques and Gilles](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles), [Meddon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016104047/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Meddon)
